name: VanishInTheCrowd
description:
A little party game inspired of "Sharky Swim" in Pummel Party

You can play it from 2 to 4 players with controllers

Spiders controlled by players have to collect all the talkies walkies to be saved.

The last player have to kill them before the reinforcements come.

Every spiders animations are procedural and the crowd is moving according boids / flocking simulation algorithm.

Have fun !
